name: NEURAL SHOCK: Path of Legend
description:
Experience the end of an iconic story in the final part of NEURAL SHOCK!

You have access to a large arsenal to eliminate dangerous enemies.

Many systems and original game mechanics.

For example, the "greensys" system for garbage generation.

Good optimization for playing on any PC.

And most importantly, the game is designed in the direction of quality and non-profit.

Have a good game!

You can't download the game. Because I accidentally deleted the source code after development. But since on average only 5 people download my games, this is normal :)

Instead of Path of Legends, I suggest you play Blood Time.
